name: Angry Shark Hunting Adventure
description:
shark is dangerous animal with huge body and a big threat to the humans and other Sea animals. Lets shoot these hungry and dangerous sharks with your sniper gun.
Download this shooting game ,In this Shark shooting game you get an ocean environment and some people are in danger between these sharks ,you have to shoot these dangerous sharks before they attack on innocent people,and prove your shooting skills.
carry your sniper rifle to kill and give a head shoot to these dangerous shark of deep blue sea and save humans.

Features:

Real shark hunting gaming experience
3D Ocean environment
Sniper gun control
Cool sounds effect
Great HD graphics
